summary: Factory does not accept or pass optional config overrides as required, preventing runtime configuration adjustments.

issues.description: Factory options do not include config overrides and loadAgentGatewayConfig() is called without passing overrides, violating the acceptance criteria and preventing runtime configuration changes.
issues.explanation: Adds the missing optional config overrides to the factory options and forwards them into loadAgentGatewayConfig(), satisfying the acceptance criteria and enabling runtime configuration customization.
